rsurveyjs 0.1.0

SurveyJS widget for Shiny

Source: R/surveyjs.R
surveyjs.Rd

Render a SurveyJS form from a JSON/list schema. Final answers are delivered to input[[paste0(id, "_data")]] after the user clicks Complete. If live = TRUE, live updates while typing are delivered to input[[paste0(id, "_data_live")]].

Usage

surveyjs(
  schema,
  data = NULL,
  readOnly = FALSE,
  live = TRUE,
  theme = "defaultV2",
  locale = "en",
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  elementId = NULL
)

Arguments

schema

List or JSON string; SurveyJS survey JSON.

data

Optional named list of initial answers.

readOnly

Logical; render in read-only mode.

live

Logical; send live updates while typing? Default TRUE.

theme

SurveyJS theme name (e.g., "defaultV2" for v1.x).

locale

Locale code (e.g., "en", "de").

width, height

CSS size or number for the widget container.

elementId

Optional element id.

Value

An htmlwidget to be used in Shiny UIs.
